dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A digital ocean, and Facebook's trying to filter out the poison with an AI net.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A digital ocean, and Facebook's trying to filter out the poison with an A I net.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Facebook says it identifies most of the content automatically using artificial intelligence and advanced software before users can ever see it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and their latest transparency report is showing just how much they're catching—especially on Instagram, which is included for the first time.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and their latest transparency report is showing just how much they're catching-especially on Instagram, which is included for the first time.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The company revealed its sweeping efforts to police its own network in its latest biannual transparency report, which includes data from Instagram for the first time.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and the numbers are staggering—11.7 million pieces of child exploitation content removed in just the third quarter.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and the numbers are staggeringminus eleven point seven million pieces of child exploitation content removed in just the third quarter.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Facebook says that it removed about 11.6 million pieces of content it deemed to be child nudity and sexual exploitation of children in the third quarter, roughly double the number of pieces of content removed for the same reason in the first quarter.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That's, like, double what it was the previous quarter. It's a shocking jump.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's, like, double what it was the previous quarter. It's a shocking jump.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Facebook says that it removed about 11.6 million pieces of content it deemed to be child nudity and sexual exploitation of children in the third quarter, roughly double the number of pieces of content removed for the same reason in the first quarter.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But Zuckerberg argues that it's not that there's more harmful content—it's that they're getting better at finding it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But Zuckerberg argues that it's not that there's more harmful content-it's that they're getting better at finding it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Just because were reporting big numbers doesnt mean theres so much more harmful content happening on our services than others. ... What it says is were working harder to identify this and take action on it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, lawmakers aren't buying that though. Representative Ann Wagner straight up told him, "You are not working hard enough."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, lawmakers aren't buying that though. Representative Ann Wagner straight up told him, You are not working hard enough.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Representative Ann Wagner (R-MO) scolded Zuckerberg at the hearing, saying, You are not working hard enough, and end-to-end encryption is not going to help the problem.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And she criticized his push for end-to-end encryption, saying it'll make things worse for catching predators.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And she criticized his push for end-to-end encryption, saying it'll make things worse for catching predators.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Representative Ann Wagner (R-MO) scolded Zuckerberg at the hearing, saying, You are not working hard enough, and end-to-end encryption is not going to help the problem.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: The FBI director agrees—calling encryption a "dream come true" for child pornographers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The F B I director agrees-calling encryption a dream come true for child pornographers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: FBI Director Christopher Wray has also been critical of Facebooks plan to encrypt all of its users messages in the near future. Wray says that it would be a dream come true for child pornographers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But Zuck insists encryption won't hinder their ability to detect violations through behavior patterns.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But Zuck insists encryption won't hinder their ability to detect violations through behavior patterns.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: But the encryption were proposing wouldnt make it any harder for us to prevent any of the content [that violates our terms of service]. He said content violations can often be detected through behavior patterns, such as who is messaging whom.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Like, who's messaging whom, and how often—stuff like that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Like, who's messaging whom, and how often-stuff like that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He said content violations can often be detected through behavior patterns, such as who is messaging whom. We can look at patterns of bad activity, he said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. He says they can still spot bad activity even if they can't see the content itself.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. He says they can still spot bad activity even if they can't see the content itself.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Still, with nearly 12 million reports linked to Messenger alone last year, it's a massive challenge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still, with nearly twelve million reports linked to Messenger alone last year, it's a massive challenge.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The New York Times in September claimed that Facebook Messenger was responsible for nearly 12 million of the 18.4 million worldwide reports of child sexual abuse material.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And he calls reporting high numbers a sign of progress, not failure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he calls reporting high numbers a sign of progress, not failure.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During a press call with reporters on Wednesday, Zuckerberg responded to concerns about the vast amount of child exploitation content found on the companys networks, claiming that it was actually a positive thing for the industry and society.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's a tough balance—privacy versus protection.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a tough balance-privacy versus protection.
